content: chichester is a little knitted pig made from a one piece no-sew super quick pattern make lots of them and hide them in peoples pockets a german translation by julie röder is available here https //drive google com/file/d/0bzlumotxmlbimdf6uhjwrejxqve/view usp=sharing and a version for two needles by jen sloan is here http //apocalypseknits blogspot com/2012/01/chichester-pig-on-two-needles html
